public static java.lang.String colorize(@NotNull
                                                  java.lang.String $this$colorize,
                                                  @Nullable
                                                  org.bukkit.entity.Player player)

        A simple chat colorization method.

        Parameters:
        player - the player to use for PlaceholderAPI's placeholders. If null, it will be ignored and placeholderswill not work
        Returns:
        The new string with placeholders and colors.
